bugmine.config.title: BugMine
bugmine.category.bug_fixes.name: Bug Fixes
bugmine.category.qol.name: Quality of Life
bugmine.category.qol.tooltip: Quality of Life changes for the 25w14craftmine snapshot.
bugmine.group.client.name: Client-Side
bugmine.group.client.description: Changes that apply to the client.
bugmine.group.server.name: Server-Side
bugmine.group.server.description: Changes that apply to the server.
bugmine.options.allowSoulLinkOnLanServer: Allow Soul Link On LAN Servers
Allows the usage of Soul Link when your singleplayer world is open to LAN.
bugmine.options.functionalShields.name: Functional Shields
bugmine.options.functionalShields.descri: Restores the shield's ability to block attacks.
bugmine.options.obtainableDragonFire.des: Makes the dragon fire player unlock available by getting damaged from an Ender Dragon's area effect cloud rather than directly from its fireball.
bugmine.options.obtainableNoDrops.name: Obtainable No Drops
bugmine.options.obtainableNoDrops.descri: Gives the No Drops mine ingredient an unlock condition. According to etanaratsastaja, software engineer at Mojang, it was originally dropped randomly from mobs with a 5% chance, so that's the unlock condition provided here.
bugmine.options.preventCtrlQFreeze.name: Prevent Ctrl+Q Freeze
bugmine.options.preventCtrlQFreeze.descr: Stops you from freezing your client by doing Ctrl+Q on a mine ingredient in the Mine Crafter.
bugmine.options.preventIngredientSwappin: Stops you from swapping (hotkeying) mine ingredients out of the Mine Crafter.
bugmine.options.preventIngredientThrowin: Stops you from throwing mine ingredients out of the Mine Crafter.
No longer get disconnected when you send a packet while entering a mine.
bugmine.options.preventSoulLinkCrash.des: No longer crash upon taking damage with soul link active.
bugmine.options.rabbitsSpawnsRabbits.des: Makes the "Rabbits" mine ingredient spawn rabbits instead of parrots.
